name: Tower Defense Sudden Attack
description: Tower Defense Sudden Attack is a strategy game set in a military base seized by many terrorists and now is under attack.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 210 MB available space
